<h3 id="X9580">X(9580)&nbsp;=&nbsp;INSIMILCENTER OF THESE CIRCLES: BEVAN AND 2ND JOHNSON-YFF</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^3-2*(b+c)*a^2+(b-c)^2*a-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c) : :
<br>
<b>
X(9580) = r*X(40)+2*(R-r)*X(1479)
</b>
<p>X(9580) lies on these lines: {1,30}, {3,7743}, {4,1697}, {9,3434}, {10,5225}, {11,165}, {20,1420}, {35,6911}, {40,1479}, {43,9554}, {46,4857}, {55,1538}, {57,497}, {63,149}, {200,528}, {226,390}, {329,5853}, {354,4312}, {515,7962}, {517,1864}, {908,3158}, {946,3601}, {950,962}, {1040,1421}, {1058,4292}, {1210,5128}, {1695,9555}, {1706,2478}, {1770,3333}, {1788,5493}, {1837,7991}, {1898,5904}, {2078,7580}, {2093,5722}, {2136,3436}, {2481,7243}, {2550,7308}, {2886,4512}, {3057,5691}, {3243,5905}, {3303,5290}, {3476,4342}, {3485,4314}, {3486,4301}, {3529,4311}, {3534,5126}, {3576,4302}, {3583,5119}, {3612,4330}, {3624,5217}, {3679,3715}, {3681,7673}, {3729,4514}, {3749,3944}, {3817,5218}, {3838,4428}, {3870,5057}, {3886,4388}, {3895,5080}, {3911,5274}, {3914,7290}, {3929,4847}, {4304,5603}, {4308,5059}, {4326,8255}, {4333,5563}, {4421,5087}, {4640,5231}, {4666,6173}, {4678,7319}, {4679,8580}, {4863,5223}, {4883,4888}, {4901,5014}, {5175,5837}, {5284,7676}, {5432,7988}, {5697,5881}</p>
<p>
X(9580) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (40,6827), (57,497), (2093,5722), (3476,4342), (5727,3586) <br>
X(9580) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,1836,4654), (4,1697,9578), (55,1699,5219), (946,4294,3601), (950,962,3340), (1836,3058,1), (3583,5119,5587), (4847,5698,3929)<br></p>
